price: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glory be to Allah far above what they associate with Him.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
